page.title: 17James Sumsion's day
page.content: At 11.00 I get woken up by my mum I had a cereal called "Start",I read a comic called "Buster"and ask my mum if I can go down to the leisure centre in Newbury,with Craig.I get changed and dive into the pool I race Craig and duck him, I come out after an hour and go to the canteen for a snack (sweets) and my mum drives me home.I put my swimming trunks in the washing machine, and put my towel on the line to dry,and go out to play with Craig. We go over the building site where the jumps are.After a while I come in(at 5.30)then have a shower followed by supper which is salad.I watch "Knight Rider"on television and "The Kenny Everet Show."Afterwards I change into my American football pyjamas,wash then go to bed.
